name: PSNProfiles.com - Darker completion/platinum color
description: This style makes the blue (platinum), green (100%, your place on a leaderboard, earned trophies in a guide) and red (cheated) background color a little bit darker.
additional_info:
1.4 (2018-07-26)
* Updated the CSS to match the new site layout update.

1.3 (2014-11-03)
* Added earned (green), seen on trophy guides.

1.2 (2013-02-19)
* Added me (green), seen on different leaderboards.

1.1 (2013-02-08)
* Added cheated (red), and made that darker as well.

1.0 (2013-02-07)
* Initial release
